text: Suhas (19 August 1990) is an Indian film actor who works in Tollywood (Telugu cinema). He started his career as junior artist appearing in Dohchay and Raviteja’s Lordmaster advertisement. Starting his YouTube career in 2015, his comic timing and unique dialogue delivery made him famous on digital platform. Short films like Athidi, Suddhapappu Aavakai, and Kalaakarudu. His performance in Athidi got him appreciation and fetched him many roles in mainstream cinema. == Career == Suhas started acting with the Telugu Youtube channel ‘Chai Bisket’ and has acted in several short films including The Athidhi by Sandeep Raj and Kalakaarudu. He made his film debut with Padi Padi Leche Manasu (2018) and has played supporting roles in several films including Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya (2019). In a review of the film by The Times of India, the reviewer wrote that "Suhas makes an impressive cameo as Detective Bobby", and Majili(2019), after which, he has been sometimes referred to as "Majili Suhas". Suhas is set to colloborate with his best friend Sandeep Raj for Colour Photo. He makes his lead acting debut with this film, which stars Sunil as the antagonist. Suhas also reprised the role played by Soubin Shahir in Maheshinte Prathikaaram in the Telugu remake titled Uma Maheswara Ugra Roopasya, lead role played by Satyadev Kancharana.
